name: Curse of Keeping
text: You curse the target with the inability to sell, barter, or give away any item it owns, other than ordinary currency, for as long as the spell remains in effect. The target cannot sell, trade, drop, or give away possessions. The target can purchase items using ordinary currency but can’t then sell the purchased items. The target can accept gifts from others but can’t offer anything in exchange. A curse of keeping can be ended by break enchantment, limited wish, remove curse, miracle, or wish. Dispel magic does not affect a curse of keeping.
text_zh: 你诅咒目标，只要还在法术效果持续时间内，除非使用普通货币，否则目标将无法贩卖、以物易物，或是丢弃属于他的任何东西。目标不能贩卖、交易、丢弃或放弃财产。目标可以用普通货币买东西，但不能把买来的东西卖掉。目标可以从他人那接受礼物，但不能交换任何东西。保管诅咒可以被破除结界(break enchantment)有限祈愿术 (limited wish)移除诅咒 (remove curse)神蹟术 (miracle)或是wish (祈愿术)中止。解除魔法 (Dispel magic)对保管诅咒无效。
